meanings.definition: Showing cowardice or lack of courage.
meanings.sent1: The dastardly villain ran away at the first sign of trouble.
meanings.sent2: It was a dastardly act to leave his friend behind in danger.
meanings.sent3: The dastardly squirrel pretended to be brave but was actually scared of acorns.
meanings.sent4: The dastardly storm clouds loomed overhead, making everyone hide indoors.
meanings.sent5: The dastardly lion cowered in fear at the sight of a tiny mouse.

meanings.definition: Characterized by underhanded or treacherous behavior.
meanings.sent1: The dastardly plan involved stealing cookies from the jar without anyone knowing.
meanings.sent2: He had a dastardly reputation for cheating in games.
meanings.sent3: The dastardly cat pretended to be sweet but would swipe at your ankles when you weren't looking.
meanings.sent4: Her dastardly smile hid the deceitful intentions behind her words.
meanings.sent5: The dastardly fox tricked the other animals into giving him all their food.
